name: 31third-safe-rebalancer
description: Automates Safe portfolio rebalancing through the 31Third ExecutorModule with policy-aware drift checks.

tools.name: check_drift
tools.description: Reads on-chain balances and policy targets, then computes weight drift against configured allocation.

tools.name: validate_trade
tools.description: Validates proposed trades against asset-universe and slippage policy constraints.

tools.name: automation
tools.description: Runs a 6-hour heartbeat drift monitor and returns a notification payload when threshold is breached.

tools.name: execute_rebalance
tools.description: Simulates and executes a validated rebalance trade batch through the 31Third ExecutorModule.

tools.name: plan_rebalance
tools.description: Generates a policy-aware rebalance plan via 31Third SDK using deployed target allocations.

tools.name: rebalance_now
tools.description: One-step rebalance that checks drift, plans with SDK from on-chain policies, then executes through ExecutorModule.

tools.name: help
tools.description: Explains skill capabilities, required environment variables, and setup path via the 31Third Safe policy wizard.
